function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of revenue leading to industry distress","Impact":"Potential bankruptcy and closure of vulnerable industries","Mitigation":"Governmental intervention and financial support","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Affected companies, employees, and stakeholders","Owner":"Government and industry leaders"},{"Description":"Risk of permanent demand decrements","Impact":"Long-term survival challenges for distressed firms","Mitigation":"Diversification of services and strategic planning","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Managers, industry experts, and stakeholders","Owner":"Company management and industry leaders"},{"Description":"Potential health risks from conducting humanitarian missions","Impact":"Exposure to COVID-19 and risk of spreading the virus","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to health and safety protocols, use of protective equipment","Technologies":"Health monitoring technologies and PPE","People":"Employees, healthcare workers, and recipients of humanitarian aid","Owner":"Company management and health organizations"}]}
